amendment.description: Amendment adds language stating that emergency contact or next-of-kin information should be included in interoperable electronic health records.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in Part C of House Report 109-603 to ensure that emergency contact information or next of kin information is included in any process to modernize medical records.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson (IL) amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
